Episodes.Title: Lucky Charm
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in the Sahara desert and they must give Zerda a charm bracelet to bring him luck in the dromedary race. On the way, they meet Acha, a young musician and Didi, her dromedary.

Episodes.Title: The Desert Archaeologist
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are passing through the region of Tassili where they meet Dalila, a young girl whose parents are archaeologists. They decide to help the family with the dig.

Episodes.Title: Urgent Delivery
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in Greece. They come across the postman whose truck has broken down. Our two friends offer to deliver invitations for the fair that will take place that evening to all the inhabitants of the village...

Episodes.Title: Stone Giants
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are staying with their friend Amaruk in Canada. They go ice fishing but everything is so white they have trouble going back to the village...

Episodes.Title: The Birthday Present
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in Japan. They just bought a gift for the twins' birthday and take a break in the park before going to the post office. But the lady next to them picks up the wrong bag and leaves with their toys...

Episodes.Title: A Helping Hand
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in Africa. They give their friend Bouba, who's playing the drums at his cousin's wedding, a hand. But he's not the only one who needs help...

Episodes.Title: Turtle Time
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in Madagascar to watch turtle eggs hatching on the beach. But Mouk is such in a hurry he does not listen to his friend's recommendations when Anosy tries to tell him about local customs.

Episodes.Title: Whoops, We Missed the Bus
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in the Andes. While they are running some errands, the bus leaves with their bikes attached to it! Api is going to help them catch up with the bus... by mule.

Episodes.Title: The Great Crossing
Episodes.Plot: Mouk and Chavapa are in Venezuela. Chavapa gets a flat tyre in the middle of the rainforest. Alouatta, a friendly man they meet, offers to take them to the next village in his boat.

Episodes.Title: Small Is Beautiful
Episodes.Plot: It's Mouk and Chavapa's last day in Tokyo. Their friend Miiko has promised to show them a very quiet and peaceful place, which is very different from everything else they have seen in Tokyo.
